humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: Based on the pathology report, the patient has no metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph node (0/1) and the nonsentinel lymph node (0/1) that were assessed. Therefore, using New Rule 11, the N stage is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that two lymph nodes were examined, one sentinel and one nonsentinel, and both were negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/1 for each). This information supports the N0 (no regional lymph node metastasis) classification. The substaging information, such as N1mi, N1a, N1b, N1c, N2, and N3, is not provided in the report.
